remediationReport.scope: Texas cities with containment failures due to incorrect data sources
remediationReport.summary: Analysis of 5 Texas cities in known-portals registry with 100% containment failure. Root cause: Houston/San Antonio metro district data incorrectly mapped to suburban cities.

currentEntry.notes: Pearland TX - 11 districts, bulk ingested from 'City Council Districts'

actualStructure.description: Mayor and 7 council members elected at-large for 3-year staggered terms. No geographic districts.

diagnosis.issue: Wrong data source - registry contains Houston city council districts (11 districts A-K)
diagnosis.rootCause: Automated discovery selected Houston metro district data for Pearland

cities.rationale: Pearland uses at-large elections with no geographic council districts. The 11 districts (A-K) are Houston's council districts. City should be excluded from geographic tessellation validation.
cities.action: Move to quarantined-portals.ts; document as at-large city

currentEntry.notes: Pasadena TX - 11 districts, bulk ingested from 'City_Council_Districts'

actualStructure.description: Mayor plus 8 councilmembers: 6 elected from districts (A-F) and 2 at-large

diagnosis.issue: Wrong data source - registry contains Houston districts (11) instead of Pasadena districts (6)
diagnosis.rootCause: URL points to Houston data, not Pasadena's 6 actual districts

cities.rationale: Pasadena has 6 actual council districts (A-F), not 11. The 11-district data is Houston's. Correct data source needed.
cities.action: Move to quarantined-portals.ts; requires research for correct Pasadena district GIS source
cities.futureAction: Find Pasadena city GIS portal with correct 6-district boundaries

currentEntry.notes: Galena Park TX - 11 districts, bulk ingested from 'City_Council_Districts'

actualStructure.description: Mayor plus 4 commissioners (Positions 1-4). Numbered positions suggest at-large elections, not geographic districts.

diagnosis.issue: Wrong data source - URL explicitly references 'HOUCity_Council_Districts' (Houston data)
diagnosis.rootCause: URL clearly shows Houston data (HOUCity prefix) mapped to Galena Park

cities.rationale: Galena Park has 4 commissioner positions (at-large), not 11 geographic districts. URL explicitly references Houston districts (HOUCity_Council_Districts). City uses numbered positions, not districts.
cities.action: Move to quarantined-portals.ts; document as at-large city

currentEntry.notes: Leon Valley TX - 10 districts, bulk ingested from 'CouncilDistricts'

actualStructure.description: Mayor and 5 council members elected at-large with 2-year staggered terms. No geographic districts.

diagnosis.issue: Wrong data source - registry contains San Antonio districts (10) instead of at-large structure
diagnosis.rootCause: URL domain (g1fRTDLeMgspWrYp) is San Antonio's ArcGIS organization, not Leon Valley

cities.rationale: Leon Valley uses at-large elections with no geographic districts. The 10 districts are San Antonio's council districts (Leon Valley is in San Antonio metro). ArcGIS organization ID matches San Antonio, not Leon Valley.
cities.action: Move to quarantined-portals.ts; document as at-large city

currentEntry.notes: Alvin TX - 97 districts, bulk ingested from 'City Council Districts'

actualStructure.description: Mayor (at-large) plus 7 councilmembers: 5 from single-member districts (A-E) and 2 at-large positions

diagnosis.issue: Wrong data source - registry points to Fort Bend County GIS portal, not city data
diagnosis.rootCause: URL explicitly references Fort Bend County (fortbendcountytx.gov), returning county boundary data (97 features) instead of city districts (5)

cities.rationale: Alvin has 5 actual council districts (A-E), not 97. The URL points to Fort Bend County's GIS portal (fortbendcountytx.gov), which returns county-level boundary data. Diagnostic: 97 features vs 5 expected districts indicates county data, not city.
cities.action: Move to quarantined-portals.ts; requires research for correct Alvin city GIS source
cities.futureAction: Find Alvin city GIS portal with correct 5-district boundaries (Districts A-E)

metro_bleeding.description: Large city's districts used for surrounding suburbs
examples: Houston districts (11) used for Pearland, Pasadena, Galena Park
San Antonio districts (10) used for Leon Valley
metro_bleeding.diagnostic: URL domain/organization ID matches large city, not suburb

county_for_city.description: County-level data substituted for city districts
examples: Fort Bend County (97 features) used for Alvin (5 districts)
county_for_city.diagnostic: Feature count >> expected district count; URL contains county domain

at_large_misclassified.description: At-large cities incorrectly assigned geographic district data
examples: Leon Valley (at-large) given San Antonio districts
at_large_misclassified.diagnostic: City charter specifies at-large elections; registry shows large district count

immediate: Quarantine all 5 TX entries to prevent serving incorrect data
Document at-large cities (Pearland, Galena Park, Leon Valley) for exclusion from tessellation
Research correct GIS sources for Pasadena (6 districts) and Alvin (5 districts)
validation: Add pre-validation check: Compare ArcGIS organization ID with expected city/county
Add sanity check: Reject if feature count > 3x expected districts
Cross-reference URL domain against city official website domain
registry_policy: Never use Houston organization ID (NummVBqZSIJKUeVR) for non-Houston cities
Never use San Antonio organization ID (g1fRTDLeMgspWrYp) for non-San Antonio cities
Flag all county-level URLs (e.g., fortbendcountytx.gov) for city-level entries
